name: RoomEscape (suppliedcoot)
description:
Welcome to Room Escape! The goal of the game is to escape the room, easy right? It's simple, there is a randomly placed key hidden in the room and you need to find it to open the door and escape! Have fun!

This game was made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam 3.0, a game jam where the theme was: Failure Is Progress. What better way to fit the theme than a classic escape room (The more you fail at finding, the less options there are)! This was very fun to make and I may further develop on it. All assets were made by me.
